title: LatchBio platform SDK for the R programming language
LatchBio platform SDK for the R programming language
LatchBio platform SDK for the R programming language
code:
library(latch)  acc <- latch::Account$current() cat("Current account is ") acc$print()  projects <- acc$list_registry_projects() cat("Latch Registry for", acc$get_display_name(), "
") for (proj in projects) {   cat(proj$get_display_name(), "
")   tables <- proj$list_tables()   for (table in tables) {     cat("  -", table$get_display_name(), "
")   } }

code: if (FALSE) { httr2::request("https://gql.example.com") %>%   graphql_body(     "query Hello($username: String!) { hello(name: $username) }",     variables = list(username = "John")   ) %>%   httr2::req_dry_run() }
